title: Create an nginx pod that uses 'myuser' as a service account
description: Create an nginx pod that uses 'myuser' as a service account

steps: 4. kubectl get pod nginx -o jsonpath='{.spec.serviceAccountName}' # output: myuser

5. kubectl exec -it nginx -- cat /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/token # to check if the ServiceAccount token is mounted inside the Pod. Starting from Kubernetes 1.24+, the token is dynamically projected into the Pod
